channel.title: [508] client shutdown
channel.description:
everytime i use range on my 508 server the client batch file writes: [code]Error: Class106:89 Class68_Sub13_Sub31:87 Class68_Sub19:165 Class68_Sub19:330 Cl ass68_Sub20:57 Class68_Sub13_Sub25:108 client:2044 Applet_Sub1:413 Applet_Sub1:1 57 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 22527 error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true[/code]
I tryed two different clients and the same thing happened.

item.title: [508] client shutdown
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

i switched sources and it works now.

Read full topic
